scene_description_enriched: The image displays a heraldic shield bearing two rampant black wolves with red tongues and claws, set against a light brown background. The wolves are depicted in profile, facing left, with their mouths open and tongues extended. The shield itself is outlined in blue. The overall composition is that of a coat of arms, likely representing a noble family or a specific lineage. There is no discernible narrative or religious scene depicted; it is purely an emblem.
